ComicInfo.Title: Planet of the Dead; All for You; Phantom Menaces; Ghosts of Hoth; The Apprentice; Dark Journey
ComicInfo.Summary: Luke is attacked by a hologram of Darth Maul, which is controlled by Darth Maul's salvaged and resuscitated brain.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-01 07:51:24. [CVDB120973] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 20:41:19. [Issue ID 266132]
